description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Outwit your friends to collect treasure in this re-imagination of Rock, Paper, Scissors... Best of five wins! Tell the truth, or lie to your opponent about your intentions by disguising your Knight, Wizard, or Rogue. Makes a great and simple party game! Originally created in 48 hours for the 2010 Global Game Jam, with help from a lot of coffee. All proceeds go to the Child's Play Charity.
